name: l'Abysse
description:
Controls - 

Move:  A-D, Left-Right

Interact and skip text:  Space

Move light: Mouse

Toggle fullscreen: F4

A game made for the LudumDare 48 game jam in 72 hours.

Harvey and his colleagues are sent to investigate strange activity reported by passing ships. They're the bottom feeders of their profession, and this is their chance to get the recognition they need.

Programming: JyriO

Story and art: WheatBoy https://wheatboy.itch.io/

Music:

Chuzausen - Chin Chun

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Daniel Birch - Indigo Strokes

Crowander - Underwater

ADDED:

Fixed a bug introduced in exporting where none of the particles would work
